LEARNINGGOAL.NAME: Knowledge about all processes a user is involved in

CRITERION.NAME: No of processes known

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Take some time to explore processes by browsing through their representation at the Learn PAd platform. Check on available comments and additional pages!

CRITERION.NAME: success rate of simulations

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Take some more time to run simulations. Ask a colleaque to collaboratively simulate a process you both are involved with!

CRITERION.NAME: training costs per new employee
decrease of time spend on similar cases

LEARNINGGOAL.NAME: Knowledge of sector specific regularity/irregularity of requests
Knowledge of the correct data and declarations
Knowledge of the application forms used for requests

CRITERION.NAME: No lawsuits after case closure
percentace of laws & regulations and how they are applied
no of errors made assessing data & declarations
no of models changed

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: goal of measurement is to rise awareness, i.e. to trigger a closer look on models recommended to be changed not to measure performance of modellers. In case of many/few changes models should be checked thoroughly.

CRITERION.NAME: no of errors made determine irregularities
percentage of templates and documents known applied correctly

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: can be measured via simulation or questionaire

CRITERION.NAME: percentage of correctly used forms
no of changes based on feedback

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: goal of measurement is to rise awareness, i.e. to trigger a closer look on models recommended to be changed not to measure performance of modellers.

CRITERION.NAME: no of errors made inviting PA parties
short response time

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Response time (on emails, missed phone callse, etc.)

CRITERION.NAME: no of complaints of clients

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Read carefulle the questionnaire a customer filled: for what reasons your performace wasnt satisfying for the client? Ask colleaques for similar situations.

CRITERION.NAME: Identification of erros & missing docs in applications within 2 days after submission
Keeping the timeline

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: providing services in time (according to the law)

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Ask yourself for the reasons for not keeping the timeline. What can you do to become better? Do you need help? Do you have problems? Discuss with your boss what can be done to support your improvement.

CRITERION.NAME: no of errors made dealing with an application
no of errors made in setting time and modalities
Acting on ones own responsibility

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: can be measured as a decrease of support requests to experts. we assume in the beginning high requests decreasing during setting in period.

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Try to solve a problem by checking on information at the Lean PAd platform: did you read the available comments? Did you check on additional pages?

CRITERION.NAME: Single Point of Contact

OPERATIONALGOAL.NAME: Intensive use of Learn PAd platform

CRITERION.NAME: total no of comments to additional pages
no of valuable feedbacks

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: no of feedbacks considered for change in relation to the total no of feedback

CRITERION.NAME: Percentage of learners improving their EQF level
total no of valuable comments
percentage of staff meeting the competence requirements
total no of comments on learning objects

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: total no of comments on static pages, i.e. pages generated from models

CRITERION.NAME: total no of additional pages
no of additional pages per user
total time of use
no of total wiki pages navigated per user
total no of Learn PAd platform users
total no of simulations

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: no of simulations performed entirely (from start to end) related to the no of simulations started but abandoned

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Try to complete simulations - take enough time for running a simulation, avoid interruptions and do not let anything distract you.

CRITERION.NAME: no of feedback created from scratch
degree of completeness of simulation per user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: degree of completeness of simulation per user

CRITERION.NAME: no of help requests per user
total no of recommendations accepted by the learner
no of valuable comments per user
no of feedback created from comments
total no of comments

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Share your opinion! Give recommendations to others! Writing a comment is a good way to improve knowledge of all of us!

CRITERION.NAME: global actions per user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: number of "interactions" with Learnpad platform in 30 days (i.e. no of comments + no of additional pages + no of pages navigated)

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Increase interactions with the LearnPad platform: consider comments, share your experience on additional pages or simply navigate through the various pages.

CRITERION.NAME: session score per simulation and user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Ratio of achieved session score to the maximum of session score

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Ask a colleaque to run a simulation together with you! Discuss your decisions and check on your arguments.

CRITERION.NAME: time spend using the Learn PAd platform per user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: individual time spend using the Learn PAd platform (per user)

CRITERION.NAME: global score per simulation and user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Ratio of achieved gobal score to the maximum of global score

CRITERION.NAME: business process score per simulation and user

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Description
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Ratio of achieved business process score to the maximum of business process score

ATTRIBUTES.NAME: Recommendation
ATTRIBUTES.VALUE: Look over an experienced colleaques shoulder when s/he performs the process. Ask about reasons for her/his decisions.

CRITERION.NAME: total no of help requests
no of comments per user
no of simulations per user
